sentences.sentence: The degradation rate of COD and ammoniac nitrogen reached 94.1% and 84.5%, respectively.
sentences.translation: 在最佳处理工艺条件下，COD和氨氮的降解率分别达到94.1%和84.5%。

sentences.sentence: The results demonstrate that the absorption rate can reach above 98% by adopting sulfuric acid to absorb ammoniac waste gas.
sentences.translation: 研究结果显示，采用硫酸吸收含氨尾气，吸收效率可达98%以上。

sentences.sentence: Ammoniac Corrosion of condenser copper tubes is the major cause of condenser leakage and copper content in boiler feed water.
sentences.translation: 凝汽器铜管的氨腐蚀，是造成凝汽器泄漏和给水含铜的重要原因。
